articles.caption: A look at Apple permitting 3rd-Party app stores
articles.title: Apple will permit third-party app stores for Europe in 2024
articles.description: A new law in Europe requires Apple to allow users in the region to download third-party app stores and payment systems to their iOS devices starting in 2024.

articles.description: StreamElements has released its November and year end edition of its State of the Stream report with key games livestreaming insights.

articles.caption: A look at what kind of mobile games can generate more than $1B in rev
articles.title: What kind of mobile games can generate more than $1 billion in revenue?
articles.description: As time goes on, mobile games have become the mainstream choice for people to spend their leisure time on. SocialPeta presents the list of the members of the $1 billion club below, hoping to help mobile game practitioners better understand the features and trends of the top mobile games.
